scene_description_enriched: Three bearded figures, likely representing the Holy Trinity, are depicted seated together, each wearing a crown. They are robed in blue and red garments, with the central figure holding a golden orb. Rays of light emanate from behind them, suggesting a divine presence. Below them, a group of figures, depicted in red and blue, are shown with hands clasped in prayer, possibly representing humanity or worshippers. The scene is framed by an arched border with decorative elements.
